main event: A light resembling a landing light was observed coming in from the southeast and passing over Naha AB, Okinawa at an altitude of approximately 1,000 feet.
interesting points: The object had no tail or wings and disappeared from sight to the northwest,The observation lasted for approximately 5 minutes,The object's speed was estimated at 600-800 mph,It was described as a spherical shape,No usable camera footage or technical report was available.
sighted object: a light resembling a landing light
witness description: military personnel observing from Naha AB
